pack.title: Construction Addon
pack.description: Are you a builder? this addon has TONS of blocks. and adds some items that are vanilla-like. including more nuggets, sticks, and bookshelf in all ...

pack.title: Christmas Presents Addon
pack.description: It's that time of the year! Halloween time go trick-or-treating!! Wait.. wrong holiday. Merry Christmas!! This addon adds 8 tiered presents hand-wrapped by legopitstop himself.

pack.title: More Stairs and Slabs Addon
pack.description: This addon adds more stairs and slabs to Minecraft Bedrock Edition (MCPE). These Include concrete slabs and stairs in all 16 colors that are survival friendly

pack.title: Lots More Food Bedrock Add-on
pack.description: Ever thought that Minecraft needed more food? Then this is your pack! This pack adds more than 50+ Foods. use to replenish those health and hunger

pack.title: Spawner Craft Behavior Pack
pack.description: This behavior pack adds in recipes for spawn eggs. You can use the spawn egg to change any spawner to spawn that mob

pack.title: Basalt Blocks Addon
pack.description: 2 Basalt blocks, not enough? Not worth the time to gather? This addon adds basalt blocks to further decorate your world, house, or nether castle!

pack.title: Minecraft Graduation Resource Pack (Bedrock Edition)
pack.description: Graduation in Minecraft? Due to unfortunate events graduation is being moved to Minecraft. Didn't you get the memo? Install this resource pack on your world

pack.title: More Gold Bedrock Add-on
pack.description: Ever thought that Minecraft needed more golden food? Then this is your pack! This pack adds more than 5+ honey Foods. use to replenish those health

pack.title: Dr Seuss Addon
pack.description: Welcome to your childhood, This week is Dr.seuss aka "Theodor Seuss Geisel" week. He is 116 years old!

pack.title: Magic Affinity
pack.description: Ever thought that Minecraft needed Magic? Then this is your pack! This pack adds amulets to magnify your world and adding new blocks to decorate!

pack.title: Vanilla Blocks Skin Pack
pack.description: Playing go hide and seek? Want to wear your favorite block? This Skin pack adds 94+ skins to Minecraft Bedrock Edition. Textures are by Jappa

pack.title: More Honey Bedrock Add-on
pack.description: Ever thought that Minecraft needed more honey food? Then this is your pack! This pack adds more than 5+ honey Foods.
